posts.postText: I just want to say, We have a great community, from the admins to the regulars, it's hard to find a dark spot. A lot of people get along very well. It makes the servers so much better when everyone is getting along, being friends, and having a damn good time. This may seem like I'm just saying this, but I'm not. We, are seriously one of the best communities. I love all of you!
Thank you kind sire! I have to agree.

It has been getting better over time, I remember that there were times when the community was not it's strongest but our server is recognized as a fun friendly server by many players I see playing on it and I agree.

Completely agree. When I was first banned (which I always do test the admins) they handeled the situation really great. Thus why I joined and I plan on staying for a long time. Keep up the good work. and honestly I have met some really great people on here too. :3
i like nnjg more than the community i own lol thats how amazing it is
